title: Merchandise
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : Merchandise**

[House Industries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/House%20Industries) has everything from posters and magazines to clothing and furniture:  
 [http://houseind.com/index.php?page=merchandise](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013249/http:/houseind.com/index.php?page=merchandise "http://houseind.com/index.php?page=merchandise")

[P22 Type foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/P22%20Type%20foundry) has an eclectic selection of shirts, books, audio CDs & hockey pucks  
 [http://www.p22.com/products/merch.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013249/http:/www.p22.com/products/merch.html "http://www.p22.com/products/merch.html")

[Mark Simonson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mark%20Simonson) has some great lettering tees available through [cafe press](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/cafe%20press).  
 [http://www.cafepress.com/marksimonson](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013249/http:/www.cafepress.com/marksimonson "http://www.cafepress.com/marksimonson")

[Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Veer) has a great selection of [books](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/books), [typo tees](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013249/http:/typophile.com/wiki/typo%20tees), posters and even lamps!  
 [http://www.veer.com/products/merch](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013249/http:/www.veer.com/products/merch "http://www.veer.com/products/merch")

**Discussion:**  
 [Typography T-shirts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150331013249/http:/typophile.com/node/19019)
author: dan_reynolds
